description:
Fast and Private Web Browser

Waterfox is the privacy-focused web browser engineered to give you speed, control, and peace of mind on the internet.
Changes - Updated the JPEG-XL library to the latest version. This should stop various websites that serve .jxl files from crashing in the tab theyâ€™re loaded. - The missing strings for Look & Feel page are now no longer missing, meaning you can change your theme preferences once again.
